name: ArtCuriousPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Art Curious Podcast”
”Alexa, start Art Curious Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Art Curious Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art curious podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Think art history is boring? Think again. It's weird, funny, mysterious, enthralling, and liberating. Join us as we cover the strangest stories in art. Is the Mona Lisa fake? Did Van Gogh actually kill himself? And why were the Impressionists so great? Subscribe to us here, and follow us at www.artcuriouspodcast.com for further information and fun extras. © 2019 Jennifer Dasal // Find us on Twitter and Instagram: @artcuriouspod

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Art Curious Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Art Curious Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
